original_title: Sri Lanka’s IQ Global launches digital readiness index
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT: Sri Lanka-based IQ Global, a business solution provider has launched a Digital Readiness Index (DRI), in collaboration with the Kelaniya University for companies to track and manage the working environment in companies.
The DRI tracks customer engagement, organization and talent, products and services, digital operations and strategy and ‘excitement’, the company said.
IQ Global website says the tool is available online for companies.

“The index will prepare, evaluate and inform participants of the tool that will support corporates effectively manage and check-up into the modern marketplace to overcome the challenger’s business face with automation, artificial intelligence and big data,” the company said. (Colombo/ Mar3/2023)
